modal.title: Add New Tile
modal.text: Tilez R Teh Main Element Ov Homarr. They R Usd 2 Display Ur Apps An Othr Informashun. U Can Add As Lotz Da Tilez As U Wants.

widgetDescription: Widgets Interact Wif Ur Apps, 2 Provide U Wif Moar Control Ovar Ur Applicashuns. They Usually Require Addishunal Configurashun Before Use.
